title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/14/21
itunes:title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/14/21
description:
George Noory and Monsignor Stephen Rossetti explore his career as an exorcist and the training that protected him from attacks by demons, how people may not know that they are possessed by evil spirits, and whether Satan is winning the battle to increase evil in the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
